select * from ( select rownum as rn, t.* from ( select hostname, hostipaddr, confid, priority, licid, protocoltype, authport, syncport, ftradiusenabled, radiusenabled, radauthport, httpenabled, httpport, httpsenabled, httpsport, keystorepwd, certificatepwd, keystoreinstance, keystorerootpath, soapenabled, soapport, webservicename, descp FROM otppms_hostinfo WHERE 1=1
hostipaddr like '%$hostipaddr$%'
hostname like '%$hostname$%'
order by hostipaddr asc) t where rownum < = #endRow#) tt where rn > #startRow# order by hostipaddr asc
